brand_summary.style_keywords: cyberpunk neon futuristic bold electric modern sleek high-contrast tech minimal dark mode

instagram_prompts.gemini_prompt:
Create a 1080×1080px Instagram post using this exact specification:

BACKGROund: Solid #000000 background
TYPOGRAPHY: Inter font throughout
MAIN HEADLINE: "From Developer Dependency to True Ownership" in #FFFFFF at 72px bold, centered near top
SUPPORTING TEXT: "• Code locked behind proprietary systems\n• No documentation\n• Expensive monthly fees with zero control\n\nVS\n\n• Clean, documented code you OWN\n• No monthly hostage fees\n• Edit content without calling anyone" in #FFFFFF at 24px regular, below headline
ACCENT ELEMENTS: "BEFORE" and "AFTER" labels in #00FF00 at 32px semi-bold
STYLE: Cyberpunk neon futuristic bold electric modern sleek high-contrast aesthetic with tech minimal dark mode feel
SPACING: 100px padding on all sides for mobile readability
EFFECTS: Subtle green glow effect around accent text, split-screen visual divider in electric green
BRAND ELEMENT: Small "OCM Digital" logo in #00FF00 at bottom center

Design for maximum impact and brand consistency with gaming-inspired professional aesthetic.

Create a 1080×1080px Instagram post using this exact specification:

BACKGROund: Solid #000000 background
TYPOGRAPHY: Inter font throughout
MAIN HEADLINE: "Tech You Truly Own & Control" in #FFFFFF at 72px bold, centered near top
SUPPORTING TEXT: "No more waiting weeks for simple updates\nNo more paying monthly fees for your own content\nNo more starting over when developers vanish\n\nInstead: Edit your site without coding\nOwn every line of code\nNever depend on anyone again" in #FFFFFF at 24px regular, below headline
ACCENT ELEMENTS: "NO MORE" and "INSTEAD" in #00FF00 at 32px semi-bold as section headers
CTA TEXT: "Ready to take back control?" in #000000 at 28px semi-bold on #00FF00 background with 24px padding, rounded corners
STYLE: Cyberpunk neon futuristic bold electric modern sleek high-contrast aesthetic with tech minimal dark mode feel
SPACING: 100px padding on all sides for mobile readability
EFFECTS: Electric green glow effect around CTA button, subtle grid pattern overlay in dark grey
BRAND ELEMENT: "OCM Digital" in #00FF00 at bottom right corner

Design for maximum impact and brand consistency with liberation and empowerment visual metaphors.

Create a 1080×1080px Instagram post using this exact specification:

BACKGROund: Solid #000000 background
TYPOGRAPHY: Inter font throughout
MAIN HEADLINE: "Finally, I own my own store again!" in #FFFFFF at 72px bold, centered near top
QUOTE ATTRIBUTION: "- Sarah, Boutique Owner" in #00FF00 at 24px semi-bold, right-aligned under headline
SUPPORTING TEXT: "Sarah's Transformation:\n\n• From $300/month platform fees to $0\n• From limited customization to full control\n• From 2-week wait times to instant updates\n• From dependency to independence" in #FFFFFF at 24px regular, center-aligned
ACCENT ELEMENTS: "BEFORE" and "AFTER" metrics in #00FF00 at 28px semi-bold
CTA TEXT: "Ready for your liberation story?" in #000000 at 28px semi-bold on #00FF00 background with 24px padding, rounded corners at bottom
STYLE: Cyberpunk neon futuristic bold electric modern sleek high-contrast aesthetic with tech minimal dark mode feel
SPACING: 100px padding on all sides for mobile readability
EFFECTS: Quotation marks in electric green, subtle success indicator icons, green glow around CTA
BRAND ELEMENT: "OCM Digital" logo in #00FF00 at bottom left corner
